scripts.docs:build: yarn run docs:clean && yarn run docs:prepare && gitbook build -g toolsplus/docs && cp assets/favicon.ico _book/gitbook/images && cp CNAME _book
scripts.docs:publish: yarn run docs:clean && yarn run docs:build && cp CNAME _book && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update book' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update book' && git push git@github.com:toolsplus/docs gh-pages --force
